text: Kairon; IRSE! is a progressive rock and shoegaze band from Finland. == Albums == * The Defect In That One Is Bleach / We're Hunting Wolverines (2011) * Ujubasajuba (2014) * Ruination (2017) * Polysomn (2020) == References == Category:Finnish post-rock groups Category:Musical groups established in 2010
title: Kairon; IRSE!
